entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:39 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 03:17 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
